column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Diy_coref|
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Diy_coref_re|BT_webanno.custom.Diy_coref
#Text=[0006] One kind of CEETS uses magnetic induction to transfer energy.
#Text=Energy from a primary winding in the power supply is transferred inductively to a secondary winding in the chargeable device.
#Text=Because the secondary winding is physically spaced from the primary winding, the inductive coupling occurs through the air.
#Text=[0007] Without a physical connection between the primary winding and the secondary winding, conventional feedback control is not present.
#Text=Thus, control of the energy transfer in a CEETS from the primary to the secondary is difficult.
#Text=[0008] One common solution is to design a CEETS dedicated to one type of device.
#Text=For example, a CEETS for a rechargeable toothbrush is designed only for recharging a toothbrush, while a CEETS for a rechargeable telephone works only with a specific type of telephone.
#Text=While this solution allows the CEET to operate effectively with one particular device, it fails to be sufficiently flexible to allow the power supply to operate with different remote devices.
#Text=[0009] Further, since the remote device could be an electronic device capable of performing various tasks, communication with the remote device is desirable.
#Text=One such system is described in U.S.
#Text=Pat.
#Text=No. 6,597,076, in which an actuator powered by a CEET communicates with a process computer in order to provide information relating to up-to-date actuator information.
#Text=The remote device communicates with a transceiver located at a central processor.
#Text=Direct communication between the CEET and the actuator is not, however, provided.
#Text=[0010] In a system shown in U.S.
#Text=Pat.
#Text=No. 5,455,466, a portable electronic device receives power from a CEET.
#Text=Communication between a computer and the portable electronic device is provided by way of the CEET.
#Text=The CEET acts as a pipeline between the portable electronic device and the computer.
#Text=The CEET does not obtain information related to the operation of the CEET from the remote device.
